name: NyanHunt
description:
NyanHunt is a first Computer Vision game.

The essence of the application - using the smartphone camera to look for peoples and allows you to earn points for found "backside". There is a type of gaming - you can play at different levels of difficulty or just engage in free hunting. The app looks for "backside" in jeans, shorts, panties or... hmm... boobs :-)

This is an experimental application. I'm exploring the possibilities for gaming the computer vision systems and wondering if they have a future in this area. The application uses OpenCV and Haar cascades. I gather a team for the development of the project (write to facebook or comment).

If you have any suggestions or questions, please let me know in the comment.

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/nyanhuntapp/

Any donations would be appreciated to help with the development of the project.
